text: Girdhari Lal Yadav is a competitive sailor from Madhya Pradesh. He is a 2009 recipient of the Arjun Award. ==References== Category:Indian male sailors (sport) Category:Recipients of the Arjuna Award Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Sportspeople from Madhya Pradesh
title: Girdhari Lal Yadav
